    Company Updates

    • TJX Companies
      334 days ago

      Did you know that all of our TJX stores are closed on Easter, Thanksgiving & Christmas? We think it is important for our Associates to focus more on their family & loved ones during the holidays. It's just one of the ways we work to support a positive work-life balance for our Associates.

      Sound like a fit for you?
      Check out our open Store Management roles: http://glassdoor.com/slink.htm?key=vQKNS
      Check out our open Store Associate roles: http://glassdoor.com/slink.htm?key=vQKNJ

      TJXJobs.com

      Jobs at TJX. Using this Website, you can search for a job, print an application for employment, and view the benefits of working for The TJX Companies, Inc.

We are hiring for roles all across this new DC from Operation Supervisors to HR Managers and more. Check it out!: http://glassdoor.com/slink.htm?key=vQWhs

    TJX Companies – Why Work For Us?

    Who We Are

    • Who We Are
    • Our Brands
    • Our Culture
    • Your Career

    WHO IS TJX

    The TJX Companies, Inc. is the leading off-price retailer of apparel and home fashions in the U.S. and worldwide. Our mission is to deliver great value to our customers through the combination of brand, fashion, price and quality, and we are pleased to offer our customers a rapidly changing assortment of brand name, designer and other high-quality merchandise at prices generally 20%-60% below department and specialty store regular prices on comparable merchandise, every day.

    Brand names for you, your family and your home for less. Every day. Our mission is to deliver great value on ever-changing selections of brand name and designer fashions at prices generally 20%-60% below department and specialty store regular retail prices on comparable merchandise, every day. We’re able to offer these great values because of our flexible business model, our strong vendor relationships and our opportunistic buying strategies. TJX is not an outlet store, but an off-price retailer. For us, value is a combination of fashion, brand, quality and price.

    Read more

       

     
    Did you know we have 7 retail chains and 3 e-commerce sites? All our brands have one thing in common - VALUE. Our mission is to deliver great value to our customers through the combination of brand, fashion, price and quality, and we are pleased to offer our customers a rapidly changing assortment of brand name, designer and other high-quality merchandise at prices generally 20%-60% below department and specialty store regular prices on comparable merchandise, every day.
     

    MEET OUR BRANDS IN THE US

    / First store opened in 1976 
    / 1,190+ stores and counting, including online retail www.tjmaxx.com
    / Discover an ever-fresh array of fashionable, brand name and other high-quality apparel, home fashions and more. TJ Maxx offers an expanded assortment of fine jewelry and accessories, and in some stores, The Runway, a high-end designer department.
     
     
    / Acquired by TJX in 1995
    / 1,030+ stores and counting
    / Be surprised with an ever-changing assortment of fashionable, brand name and other high-quality family apparel, home fashions and more. Marshalls offers a full line of family footwear and an expanded men’s department, as well as The CUBE, a department specifically for juniors.
     
    / First store opened in 1992
    / 600+ stores and counting
    / With a vast array of ever-changing items, HomeGoods allows our customer to create a home that’s all her own. She can find decorative accessories, bedding, accent furniture, and a Daily Gourmet department, as well as kids and pet products, all at an amazing value.
     
    / Acquired by TJX in 2012
    / 12 stores and counting, including online retail www.Sierra.com
    / Explore a wide selection of brand name and other high-quality outdoor gear, apparel, footwear, sporting goods, and home fashions for active families, at great value.
     
    / First store August 2017 in the US.
    / Discover a new kind of home store designed to inspire. Homesense offers an expanded selection in furniture, lighting, and wall art. Explore the extensive rug emporium, entertaining marketplace, General Store, gifts for all occasions, and décor curated from across the globe, all at prices that make sense.
     
     
    Read more

    At TJX, we strive for a workplace where our Associates feel welcomed when they walk in the door, valued for their diversity of thought, background, and experience, and engaged with our mission to provide value to our customers. We fully appreciate that our Associates bring our business to life, and we aim to support them by making TJX a terrific place to work.

    It’s very important for us to attract ambitious and talented individuals, teach them the fundamentals of our off-price model, offer them challenging assignments, and support their career growth. We believe this encourages Associates to join us, not just for a job, but to build a career. With over 36% of people in managerial positions around the world having been with TJX for 10 or more years, we believe our approach is working.


    We are proud of our culture – and we talk a lot about it! Staying true to that culture has been a priority for over four decades and will continue to be as we grow and expand around the globe.



    Read more

    Head to our career site at Jobs.TJX.com to find your next career!

    Interviewing at TJX Companies

    1. Featured Interview

      Helpful (17)  

      Merchandising Development Program Interview

      Anonymous Employee in Framingham, MA
      Accepted Offer
      Positive Experience
      Average Interview

      Application

      I applied through college or university. The process took 2+ months. I interviewed at TJX Companies (Framingham, MA) in March 2018.

      Interview

      Initially I had to complete an online interview that was all virtual with recorded responses. The next step in the process was an on-site assessment day where we did an individual and group allocation exercise. Following these were 4 individual behavioral based interviews.

      Interview Questions

      • Why TJX?   Answer Question
      • What is the thing you're most proud of   Answer Question
      • Tell me about a time when you disagreed with your supervisor and how you overcame the conflict.   1 Answer
      TJX Companies 2018-05-01 06:39 PDT
    See All 632 Interviews
